column2: Enchanté mademoiselle, je m'appelle Armoise.
Whatever, Phostnack here.
I can't help but wònder what your majèstìque bodì is made of, mon chéri.
I bèlieve we should dàns toghetèr on thìs lounge musìque. Slowlì, charminglì, passionatelì...
Your turquoise bodì is ...oh so very delicatlì shinì, marvellouslì sparklìng... Je suis captiveted.
And you'll keep being that way 'mon chéri'. Wondering, that is.
And I believe we should not. Here's a stalemate for you.
Some people are lucky, I just so happen to be one of them.
Sacré bleu, is sòmething troublìng your days chéri? I could hear you out ma fille, you onlì need ask.
Oh, but I'm redì to do whatevèr you ask of me for that answer, you see.
You're very mystèrious... Armoius, he likes mystèrious.
Well, if I pay close attention to it there is one small thing that's troubling me: it's you.
I do. How about some floobing then? I can giggle and you'd dribble my bells, than we'll wobble and bobble and...
But Phostnack does't like Armoise, goodbye.
Oh, why so? Are you perhaps insecure of your skìlls?
Don't be shy chéri I'll gide you
Very determìnd... Armoise, he likes determìnd
Actually I simply find you repulsive
So guide me then!
But Phostnack does't like Armoise, goodbye.
I can't help but wònder what your majèstìque bodì is made of, mon chéri.
I bèlieve we should dàns toghetèr on thìs lounge musìque. Slowlì, charminglì, passionatelì...
Some othèr pepòl like confidànce, as it happens I'm one of them.
It's made of sugar, Armoise, do you want some?
And dancing it shall be.
That's very nice of you to say. Well, gotta go now.
Enchanté monsieur, je m'appelle Armoise
H-Hello, I'm Demolitos... but my friends call me Demmy!
Why are you carrìng those mancìng and eavì axes in an élevateur mon chéri?
Demmì, what a cute name. Can I touch your axes mon chéri?
Those are verì wide shoulders mon chérì. Armoise, he likes wide shoulders.
I... I'm a Warrior.
NO! I-I'm sorry... they are a present from my e-eighth birthday... Grandma made them!
I... eheh... thank you!
Oh, I wònder what terrible catastrophe may have pushed you to becòme one.
Oh, than we should tussle right now! Come here mon strong warrior!
You look verì strong indeed! Armoise, he likes strong.
C-catastrophe? No! I just want to be the stro-strongest warrior!
Ah! Oh! Wuatà!
I... uh... thank you!
Oh! How verì nice of her, and you got your majestìque shoulders swinging them, did you?
Oh! How verì nice of her, show me how you powerfully swing them mon chéri!
You have verì wide shoulders mon chèrì. Armoise, he likes wide shoulders.
eheh... yes I did
Ah. Oh. UuuuOh!
I... eheh... thank you!
That's very cute of you mon chéri, I wònder what you destinatìon may be.
Oh, than we should tussle right now! Come here mon strong warrior!
You're very ambitious Demmì. Armoise, he likes ambitious.
I... well... it's this floor. *Demolitos get's off*
Ah! Oh! Wuatà!
Oh... uh... I... eheh.
Bark Bark
Bark, sure.
Bark
Woof
Arf
Whatever, goodbye.
Damn it, you're so cute!
Ooh, that's a-d-o-r-a-b-l-e!
Bark Bark
Ooh, what a nice doggy!
Bark
Woof
Arf
Come here doggy! Aaaww doggy doggy naaawww! Ahahahah, here's take some *num num num-num-num*
Uhuh cutie doggy come here you gucci gucci guuuuuuu
Ahahahah, here doggy here! *scrubble scrubble* you love it doggy don't you? gucci gucci guuuuu doggy! Eheheh!
Sacré bleu, a walking Table!
How... did this Table walk here?
Mmmh, I wònder if I should engage in some ploisur with Table here...
What a finelì crafted Table. Armois, he likes finelì crafted.
Bark Bark!
Bark!
Woof!
Arf!
crick, crick, crick, crick, crick...
crick, crick, crick, crick, crick...
crick, crick, crick, crick, crick...
Don't know. How 'bout making out?
Uh! ... what? I... My name is Demolitos.
And I'm Meryl sweetheart, how'd you like some tickling? *giggle*
And I'm Meryl sweetheart. More open to making out now that we know each other?
Sure, Demolitos. My name is Meryl.
ihih... not there... ehehehe.... stop stop! ahahahahahahhahah!
I... what?!
